00022 #ifndef __AUDACITY_ODTASKTHREAD__
00023 #define __AUDACITY_ODTASKTHREAD__
00024 #include <wx/thread.h>
00025 
00026 #include "../Audacity.h"   // contains the set-up of AUDACITY_DLL_API
00027 
00028 class ODTask;
00029 
00030 #ifdef __WXMAC__
00031 
00032 // On Mac OS X, it's better not to use the wxThread class.
00033 // We use our own implementation based on pthreads instead.
00034 
00035 #include <pthread.h>
00036 #include <time.h>
00037 
00038 class ODTaskThread {
00039  public:
00040    typedef int ExitCode;
00041    ODTaskThread(ODTask* task);
00042    /*ExitCode*/ void Entry();
00043    void Create() {}
00044    void Delete() {
00045       mDestroy = true;
00046       pthread_join(mThread, NULL);
00047    }
00048    bool TestDestroy() { return mDestroy; }
00049    void Sleep(int ms) {
00050       struct timespec spec;
00051       spec.tv_sec = 0;
00052       spec.tv_nsec = ms * 1000 * 1000;
00053       nanosleep(&spec, NULL);
00054    }
00055    static void *callback(void *p) {
00056       ODTaskThread *th = (ODTaskThread *)p;
00057       /* return (void *)*/th->Entry();
00058    }
00059    void Run() {
00060       pthread_create(&mThread, NULL, callback, this);
00061    }
00062    
00065    void SetPriority(int priority)
00066    {
00067       mPriority=priority;
00068    }
00069 
00070  private:
00071    int mPriority;
00072    bool mDestroy;
00073    pthread_t mThread;
00074 
00075    ODTask* mTask;
00076 };
00077 
00078 class ODLock {
00079  public:
00080    ODLock(){
00081       mutex = (pthread_mutex_t *) malloc (sizeof (pthread_mutex_t));
00082       pthread_mutex_init (mutex, NULL);
00083    }
00084  
00085    void Lock()
00086    {
00087       pthread_mutex_lock (mutex);
00088    }
00089 
00090    void Unlock()
00091    {
00092       pthread_mutex_unlock (mutex);
00093    }
00094    
00095    virtual ~ODLock()
00096    {
00097       pthread_mutex_destroy (mutex); 
00098       free(mutex);
00099    }
00100   
00101 private:
00102    pthread_mutex_t *mutex ;
00103 };
00104 
00105 
00106 #else
00107 
00108 
00109 class ODTaskThread : public wxThread  
00110 {
00111 public:
00114    ODTaskThread(ODTask* task);
00115    
00116   
00117 protected:
00119    virtual void* Entry();
00120    ODTask* mTask;
00121    
00122 };
00123

00125 //a wrapper for wxMutex.
00126 class AUDACITY_DLL_API ODLock : public wxMutex  
00127 {
00128 public:
00131    ODLock(){}
00132   virtual ~ODLock(){}   
00133 };
